schemas.listExtensionsResXML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://openstack.org/quantum/api/v2.0" xmlns:quantum="http://openstack.org/quantum/api/v2.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <xsd:element name="extensions">
    <xsd:complexType>
      <xsd:sequence>
        <xsd:element name="extension" maxOccurs="unbounded">
          <xsd:complexType>
            <xsd:sequence>
              <xsd:element name="updated" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:normalizedString"/>
              <xsd:element name="name" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/>
              <xsd:element name="links" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">
                <xsd:complexType>
                  <xsd:simpleContent>
                    <xsd:extension base="xsd:string">
                      <xsd:attribute name="type" type="xsd:normalizedString" use="required"/>
                    </xsd:extension>
                  </xsd:simpleContent>
                </xsd:complexType>
              </xsd:element>
              <xsd:element name="namespace" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:anyURI"/>
              <xsd:element name="alias" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:normalizedString"/>
              <xsd:element name="description" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/>
            </xsd:sequence>
          </xsd:complexType>
        </xsd:element>
      </xsd:sequence>
    </xsd:complexType>
  </xsd:element>
</xsd:schema>

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Requests a specified page size of returned items from the query. Returns a number of items up to the specified limit value. Use the limit parameter to make an initial limited request and use the ID of the last-seen item from the response as the marker parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

marker.name: marker
marker.description: Specifies the ID of the last-seen item. Use the limit parameter to make an initial limited request and use the ID of the last-seen item from the response as the marker parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Comma-separated list of sort keys and optional sort directions in the form of <key>[:<direction>]. A valid direction is asc (ascending) or desc (descending).

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Requests a specified page size of returned items from the query. Returns a number of items up to the specified limit value. Use the limit parameter to make an initial limited request and use the ID of the last-seen item from the response as the marker parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

marker.name: marker
marker.description: Specifies the ID of the last-seen item. Use the limit parameter to make an initial limited request and use the ID of the last-seen item from the response as the marker parameter value in a subsequent limited request.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Comma-separated list of sort keys and optional sort directions in the form of <key>[:<direction>]. A valid direction is asc (ascending) or desc (descending).
